about_the_game:
Urban

Overview
Urban is a spine-chilling horror adventure game that immerses players in the eerie world of the Japanese urban legend "Hachishaku-sama." Set in a decrepit, isolated village in Japan, players face the terrifying presence of an 8-foot-tall (about 240 cm) female spirit known as Hachishaku-sama.

Story
The protagonist returns to their long-abandoned hometown after many years. The village, shrouded in mystery and fear, is haunted by the ominous presence of Hachishaku-sama Spirit, a ghostly figure with an unnaturally tall stature. As strange and unsettling events unfold, the protagonist must uncover the dark history of the village and find a way to escape the clutches of this relentless spirit.(more in game)

Features
Immersive Atmosphere: Experience the chilling ambiance of a haunted Japanese village, with meticulously designed environments that enhance the horror experience.
Supernatural Encounters: Face terrifying encounters with Hachishaku-sama Spirit and other paranormal entities as you navigate through the village.
Puzzle Solving: Solve intricate puzzles that reveal the dark secrets of the village and its connection to Hachishaku-sama.
Story-Driven Gameplay: Unravel a gripping narrative filled with suspense, mystery, and unexpected twists.
Survival Elements: Manage your resources and make strategic decisions to survive the horrors that lurk around every corner.

Prepare yourself for an unforgettable journey into the heart of fear, where every step you take could be your last. Can you survive the terror of Hachishaku-sama?

name: Urban

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 /64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8300 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60+ FPS in 1920x1080 low
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/ 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 120 FPS in 1920x1080 high

short_description: Urban is a horror game based on the Japanese legend of the 8-foot-tall spirit. Players explore an abandoned village haunted by Hachishaku-sama spirit, surviving encounters to uncover its dark secrets. Can you escape from Hachishaku-sama in Urban?
